content: I understand that the security labels vocabulary has been updated by harmonization efforts in November. How do we get these updated codes into the vocabulary found in FHIR? For example there should be a new "COPYMark" vocabulary value in the PrivacyMark https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode/cs.html#v3-ActCode-PRIVMARK
should already be part of the current build. Ask Ted whether it was applied
@Ted Klein I don't find COPYMark in current fhir build

has there been any movement on getting the updated v3-ActCode(s)? LIke CopyMark? I see build is still pulling v3-ActCodes from a year ago
Expansion based on http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode version 2018-08-12
